posts.title: Convert [B@ Byte Value to Hex
posts.details:
Hey All,

Wondering if someone can help me out?
I'm currently trying receive TCP Payload Data in Dashboard. Its 11 Bytes long consistently.
Using the event.getBytesAsString() command doesn't give me any data but event.getBytes() does.
My issue is, is that the Bytes are displayed as [B@ values. Which, reading the internet are Object ID codes for Byte Arrays.

So, can anyone help me out converting from these code values into my 11 byte Hex Data I can see is there in Wireshark? 

Cheers,

Chris

posts.title: Scripting scene directors for a beginner (or idiot)
posts.details:
Hi all, 

Feel like this is something stupid simple that I'm missing and please excuse my newb-ness. 

As background: I'm a software guy by trade, no formal XPression systems but have some downtime and seeing as I have 6 XPression Prime systems (3 are brand new and running Xpression 10, the other 3 are old and running Xpression 7) deployed on the way to around double that -- where we're currently using maybe 1% of XPression's capabilities I figured I'd do some "playing" to both stretch my legs and get to know XPression better. I'm using an Xpression Designer 7 license for my experimentation. Please be gentile :) 

All of the systems are controlled 100% via automation (via CII) which may complicate the question a bit.

I have a scene with a simple animation I want to come in when the scene is taken online and then reverse as the scene is taken offline. I have everything figured out except triggering the "out" animation. 

In scripting I'm currently trying

Sub OnBeforeOffline(engine as xpEngine, Self as xpScene, ByRef Handled as Boolean) 
dim director as xpSceneDirector
Self.GetSceneDirectorByName("Animation Out", director) 
director.Play(True, 5) 

When I try taking the scene offline with this code in place the scene director runs but the scene never goes offline. I've tried changing the WaitFor and TimeOut values in director.Play with no apparent effect (though the documentation I can find doesn't really describe what these parameters effect) 

If I try adding a Self.SetOffline to the end of that I crash Xpression designer with 100% repeatability...so I'm sure that's not what I should be doing. 

Thanks for any pointers!

posts.title: Script to check if a scene is online
posts.details:
I've searched this forum but can't find an example of how to check if a scene is online.

I've got a lower third with an animated background that wipes in, then slowly continues to scroll. I need to be able to use transition logic to change text and icons on top of the background, without it re-wiping in - instead, it would continue to scroll slowly (it''s a pre-rendered looping video).

I wanted to have one scene animate the background in, and have it stay live and scrolling/looping while another scene brings in the text. The issue is how to make the initial IN scene director check if the background scene is in - if not, play the background in, and if so, just wipe in the text..... argh. I may have just figured it out. 

When nothing is online, the IN SD for the text-only scene plays the background scene, since there is no 'transition logic'. When transition logic rules are matched for a back-to-back scene, only the text animates, since the background is already online. When the OUT SD plays for the text scene, it also brings the background offline.

Does this make sense? Or do I need to explicitly check for the background scene online before calling it?

posts.title: Perspective Camera Moving When Not Selected
posts.details:
I have had an issue recently when editing in XPression regarding perspective cameras moving when I slide my fingers on the touchpad of my laptop. This move happens when I have my pointer over another area of the window (materials or layers) and *do not* have the camera selected.

For example, I will want to scroll down on the materials window, so I will slide my fingers, and the view in the window will change as the perspective camera is moved when I slide my fingers. This move is often to an extreme distance (like 100,000+).

Because "undo" essentially is useless in XPression, I am then required to exit out of the project w/o saving & reopen it to get the camera back to the right spot.

This happens randomly & is very aggravating. Is there any solution to this, or should I just never edit w/ a touchpad?

posts.title: How to use Datalinq to import text from several textfiles
posts.details:
Hi there,

i have two questions.
First, what filetype or database is used in this video to get the gamedata from, excel, xml?
https://youtu.be/sFV5wR1gRIo 

 

Second, i have several textfiles, with tab-delimited names and numbers, but all in the same positions in the rows and columns; names and shirtnumbers from 11 soccerplayers in a soccer team.
Like this:
1 Name Lastname
2 Another name
3 Name
4 Person
5 Someone
....
Et cetera, till 11.

In Xpression i have a tactical formation with player names and player shirtnumbers like in the supplied image.

These names and numbers are connected to a text file thats 'textfile datalinqed'.

Often in a broadcast i have to present up to 5 matches.
I'm currently in the process of building a new Xpression project.
For the 5 matches i will at least have to mouseclick my way through at least 10x22=220 Datalinqs to link the fields from 10 textfiles to 10 Scenes.

A sh*tload of work. Very error-sensitive.
Looking at the video i mentioned, this must be easier to achieve.

The question: can i create only one scene with the playnumber and playername fields and create datalinks in these fields, where then i can place the the scene several times in my sequence and fill the fields by choosing a textfield through for instance a dopdown menu?

I once tried this through an Excelsheet on a shared disk, but data doesnt always seam to update properly, so i went back to textfiles.

posts.title: VBscript conditions
posts.details:
I need some help. I'm trying to add a condition to a script (from @bford) I've used for years successfully. The change would make a single TakeItem fire one of two (or more) TakeItems depending up on time of day. 

The original script is:

'Dim MySequencer as xpSequencer = nothing
'MySequencer = Engine.Sequencer
'Dim MyTakeItem as xpTakeItem = nothing
'MySequencer.GetTakeItemByID(12, MyTakeItem)
'MyTakeItem.Execute()

My added condition attempt is:

Dim Report as xpTextObject
Dim MySequencer as xpSequencer = nothing
MySequencer = Engine.Sequencer
Dim MyTakeItem as xpTakeItem = nothing
If Report.text = "Four" 
MySequencer.GetTakeItemByID(2001, MyTakeItem)
MyTakeItem.Execute()
End if
If Report.text = "FourThirty" 
MySequencer.GetTakeItemByID(2002, MyTakeItem)
MyTakeItem.Execute()
End if

Thanks in advance,

James.

posts.title: Material Face not updating when set to DataLinq in Sequencer
posts.details:
So... In DashBoard I have a table of the current league standings from our hockey league.
The table contains the names of the teams, games played, wins, and so on.
It also contains a relative URL to the logo of said team.

So, if I now set up a scene in Xpression where we have a visual representation of said standings. I set the names, points, games played etc to static text, just to do the design etc.
I also set the logo for each team to be a static placeholder so I can design around that.

Then, after the design and animations are done etc, I go into sequencer, drag the scene in, and set the different published areas to contain said values through DataLinq.
The text areas work just fine! They do and behave exactly as I had hoped they would! If I choose another league or the table is changed, the data shown in the text fields are correct.

HOWEVER...

The team logoes are static and stuck to the placeholder. Changing the material face in sequencer to look for a DataLinq value, it even shows the correct image path in the <> field in the sequencer, yet the actual image shown in the preview and when taken online, is just the placeholder from before.

Suggestions?
Using Xpression Designer v9.5 4989 64-bit Tessera Single Engine

posts.title: Creating Custom Transitions?
posts.details:
First off, I apologize if this is common knowledge and I just don't know yet. I'm being reintroduced to the world of live production after a decade of post production experience. Our church has recently embraced animated graphics which the post production editors/animators can easily create (including an alpha channel) and us live directors can throw into Pro Presenter and key on top of our shots. 

After thinking about it for a while, I've really wanted our live production to have more options and flexibility when it comes to transitions. I have used the basic wipes and dissolves, and we've looked into media wipes. However, I was wondering if there is a way to build a luma matte or chroma key matte transition video file in after effects and either load it into the switcher to have custom wipes and dissolves or use it as a chroma key to reveal graphics on top of shots or reveal new shots entirely. 

So, in After Effects I would use white on black and luma matte shots with that. One shot would show up when black is on screen, then transition to the second shot wherever white is introduced. This same process would work using a solid color and an alpha channel if I wanted to chroma key. That would allow us to create one transition with (for instance) custom paint brush wipes to reveal a graphic on top of a shot. Or reveal a whole new shot altogether. The second shot would just be transitioned on by revealing white. 

So, is there a way to load a custom video file to use as a transition in the switcher? Or is there a way to play a chroma key/alpha channel video and use that to transition in a keyed graphic? 

This would take the burden of creating every custom animation to reveal every graphic from our post production team, and allow our live production team to help carry that burden.

Thanks for any help you can offer!

posts.title: Script not working on different computers
posts.details:
Hi!

dim arrow as xpBaseObject

posts.title: random row from xls file
posts.details:
In the sequencer I have built a carousel, in which I call up an item, in which I show a random photo. I get this photo from an xls file. This XLS file is being connected trough datalinq.

I filter the results via datalinq. I shuffle all the values ​​present and then show only the top row.

my qyery in datalinq is

SELECT top 1 [Sheet1$].[Id], [Sheet1$].[Titel], [Sheet1$].[Locatie], [Sheet1$].[Naam], [Sheet1$].[File]
FROM [Sheet1$]
where not([Sheet1$].[Id] is null)
order by rnd([Sheet1$].[Id])

And with this I get a single result.

But this just doesn't work, because the refresh rate is not often. Every now and then I get a different result, but I can't figure out where to set the interval of refreshing. In my idea, every time expression "walks" in the carousel, past my scene, Xpression must retrieve the new values, via datalinq. Now that rarely happens.

Also the "refresh time"  (which you can fill in at the datalinq connection tab, within datalinq) does not help my results either.

posts.title: Spotify web API - Authentication Token etc...
posts.details:
So, I'm just wondering...
Is it possible to use DashBoard to control Spotify over their web API?

I can understand most of the way this would be done, and it definitely seems feasible.
However I cant quite wrap my head around how I would get the authentication done...

You can find the web API for Spotify here:
https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/

Now, it would be alot of work, sure. But as a sollution to playing audio it would be a great way to be able to connect to a spotify user, get the names of their playlists, and populate a dropdown of playlists.
That in turn would let me "load" the songs from a selected playlist, and create yet another dropdown, selecting a song, and then controlling the Spotify over DashBoard.

Two major positive points for this:

  1. I would be able to use the Spotify Catalogue for sport events and control the playback.
  2. In these COVID infested times, my Arena DJ could (if in quarantine), still work on the playlists etc while from home, and still set them up there, while I could do the playback at the arena.

Anyone? I guess this would also be relevant if I want to create something of an API for Instagram for that matter. Clues anyone? Ideas?

posts.title: Tally set up for Carbinite Black 2s
posts.details:
I've been following the instructions from the online documentation for the switcher to set up tally for cameras I have.

  1. Press MENU > Config > NEXT > Tally.
  2. Press the Add knob.
    If you are editing, or deleting, an existing tally, use the Add knob to select the tally and press the Edit, or Delete, knob.
  3. Use the Tally knob to select the tally or GPI output that you want to set up. This is the tally or GPI number, not the pin on the tally connector.
    Note: A GPI must be set to tally mode before it can be used as a tally. Refer to To Set Up a GPI Output for information in setting a GPI as a tally.
  4. Use the Input knob to select the video source that you want to tally.
    • XX — video inputs 1-36
    • BK — black
    • NoSrc — no source
    • BG — matte generator
    • MX — Media​-Storechannel 1-4
  5. Use the Output knob to select the bus that you want to video source tallied for. When the video source is selected on this bus, the tally is triggered.
    • OnAir — on-air
    • OnPrv — on preview
    • PGM — program bus
    • PV — preview bus
    • PGMX — program bus of ME X (if installed)
    • PRVX — preview bus of ME X (if installed)
    • CLNX — clean feed of ME X (if installed)
    • MinMEX — program bus of MiniME™ X
    • MMXPrv — preview bus of MiniME™ X
    • MultSX — program bus of MultiScreen X
    • MSXPrv — preview bus MultiScreen X
    • AuxX — program bus of aux bus X
  6. Press the Tally knob.
Related information
  • Tally Port

 

I pick the tally (step3), then the source(step 4), and I want it to trigger on the program bus(step 5).

After I press the Tally Knob (from step 6) it just takes me out to the "Add New" menu and it does not remember anything I did. What am I missing here? Seems like there would be some way to save it? Any help you guys can give would be appreciated.

posts.title: Workaround for DB not launching on OSX Big Sur.
posts.details:
The DashBoard team has identified an issue with the latest Mac OS, Big Sur, where any version of DashBoard will not launch.  We have a workaround, but our advice right now is to hold off on upgrading to Big Sur if you can.  It seems that other vendors are having similar issues with the new OS as well.  The DashBoard team will be looking into a fix, but currently we do not have a timeline for the release.

 

Current Workaround

 

DashBoard can still be launched on Big Sur by navigating into the Contents of the DashBoard.app. A default install location for DashBoard can be launched from the terminal with the following command:

open /Applications/DashBoard/DashBoard.app/Contents/MacOS/PermissionDashBoard

 

You can also dive into the contents from inside Finder by right mouse clicking on the DashBoard.app and selecting “Show Package Contents”. From here, navigate into the Contents folder, then into the MacOS folder, and finally run PermissionDashBoard.

posts.title: Reconnect a 3D Model - still no fix?
posts.details:
Making a new post about this, as the only other post I can find about this is 5 years old, with absolutley no answers.

https://support.rossvideo.com/hc/en-us/community/posts/360040117491-Reconnect-3D-model

Now, I myself has run into this a couple of times, and now a student at our college as well.
The model and/or path had to be changed a little...
So, with textures, materials, fonts, etc, things can be relinked, replaced and so on.
Which is great! Seeing as you don't have to redo visual logic and/or other things that are linked to the object with that material/texture/image/video.

However, boy you are screwed if you had alot of work put into a 3D object that you needed to change.
The error message is:

Resource not found in model manager: c:/generic/filepath/here.obj

And there is no way, that I am aware of, to relink this model?
Now I am aware that they should be in the Xpression subfolder "models" and I try to follow this as best I can... However, for some reason, the 3D model of a scene has an absolute path regardless of this. While an image looks for the subfolder "/images/filename.png", all 3D models seems to look for the absolute path instead. Now I might be wrong about that one, but that still doesn't mean I can relink a lost 3D model.

The error message refers to "model manager", though I cannot find this "model manager" anywhere, either in the "Display" menu, in the help documentation or any other place. And if you select the 3D model object in the scene, there is no filepath you can select and edit as far as I can see.

posts.title: Scaler preset change
posts.details:
Hi there guys, I need some help with this one.

I'm not really allowed to say what kind of scaler this is, as it was hell to even get their documentation.
But I need a way to change presets on this scaler... First step would be this one I guess...

4.5.1 Loading Preset to PVW
(1) Command

Loading Preset XX to PVW:
55 aa 00 00 fe 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 51 13 01 00 XX SUM_L SUM_H

The command data is hexadecimal. The XX indicates the preset No. (range: 0x00-0x0f,
indicating presets 1–16. For details on the specific preset No. codes, see Appendix 6.) SUM_L and
SUM_H constitute the checksum of this command frame, which is the sum of the underlined data
and 0x5555. The calculation formula is as below.

SUM = 0x00 + 0x00 + 0xfe + 0x00 + 0x00 + 0x00 + 0x00 + 0x00 + 0x01 + 0x00 + 0x00 + 0x00
+ 0x51 + 0x13 + 0x01 + 0x00 + XX + 0x5555, SUM = SUM_H<<8 + SUM_L (SUM_L stands for the
lower 8 bits of SUM, while SUM_H stands for the higher 8 bits of SUM.)

(2) Response packet

If the scaler response packet is in the following data format, the preset is loaded successfully.
aa 55 00 00 00 fe 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 01 51 13 00 00 b9 56

Now, the first part of the package is done easilly with a message builder or similar...
However, the SUM_L and SUM_H part is a bit trickier appereantly. I've tried to understand how it would work, but I just cant get a response from the scaler... Anyone care to give it a go/try?
